department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for paving at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre (NAFC) in St. John’s, NL. The scope of work for this project consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for paving and asphalt repairs.
description: The work under this contract will consist of, but will not necessarily be limited to partial removal of existing asphalt by milling the top 37.5mm, and the supply and installation of additional asphalt paving (mill/fill).
tags: Construction, Highway and Road Paving Service
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify
### ITQ for NAFC Asphalt Repairs Phase 3
#### Project Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking suppliers to provide paving services at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre (NAFC) in St. John’s, NL. The scope of work involves furnishing plant, labour, equipment, and materials for asphalt repairs and paving.

#### Project Objectives

* Evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers
* Invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project
* Award a contract to the qualified supplier with the lowest price

#### Key Details

* Estimated project value: $100,001 - $500,000
* Delivery date: 16 weeks after contract award
* Bid security will be required for this tender during phase 2

#### Contact Information

* Gary Bryant (SPAC/PSPC)
* gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19771389?extsite=MTk3NzEzODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I corrected several minor formatting errors in the original text for your output.

---

Format explained:

* Title is in bold and the title will include the main subject of the ITQ (Invitation to Qualify) announcement. Below this title, there will be a title that is a sub-topic making it clear what the subject of the announcement is (ITQ for NAFC Asphalt Repairs Phase 3)
* Project details: Presents the main information about the project, in two sub-points
*  A fifth header will make note of the forecasted duration of the project.
* Procedure for obtaining further information/urllibContact will be included last.
